channel.title: optical sensors on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in optical sensors on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Hamamatsu Photonics Logo
Hamamatsu Photonics K.K. is a Japanese manufacturer of optical sensors, electric light sources, and other optical devices and their applied instruments for scientific, technical and medical use. The company was founded in 1953 by Heihachiro Horiuchi, a former student of Kenjiro Takayanagi, who is known as “the father of Japanese television”. Hermann Simon, a leading German business author and thinker, mentioned Hamamatsu in his book titled Hidden Champions of the Twenty-First Century: The Success Strategies of Unknown World Market Leaders as an example of a “Hidden Champion”.
You can download theHamamatsulogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hamamatsu
item.description: Hamamatsu Photonics K.K. is a Japanese manufacturer of optical sensors, electric light sources, and other optical devices and their applied instruments for scientific, technical and medical use. The company was founded in 1953 by Heihachiro Horiuchi, a former student of Kenjiro Takayanagi, who is known as “the father of Japanese television”. Hermann Simon, a leading German business author and thinker, mentioned Hamamatsu in his book titled Hidden Champions of the Twenty-First Century: The Success Strategies of Unknown World Market Leaders as an example of a “Hidden Champion”.
